critique: The executive order is primarily concerned with legal and military matters, specifically amendments to the Manual for Courts-Martial regarding drug offenses. It aims to establish clear guidelines and punishments for drug-related offenses within the military. The order does not explicitly aim to evoke any particular emotion. However, it could be argued that the order aims to instill a sense of order, discipline, and justice within the military. It could also evoke a sense of fear in those who are considering or are involved in drug-related activities within the military. It could also evoke a sense of disgust in those who are against drug use. It could also evoke a sense of surprise in those who are not aware of the changes to the Manual for Courts-Martial.
